Player History
Won World Championship with Detroit in 1965...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/15/1967 to a 3-year deal worth $10,600,001 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1967, hitting .536 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/7/1976 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1976...
Had 2000th career hit on 10/3/1977, off Doug Rau (DET)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/4/1978 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Released by New York (A) on 3/2/1978...
